column5: Just got back from cedar lake and fishing was pretty dang good. 27.3 inch walleye the biggest and 18 inch smallmouth the biggest. My wife and I caught over 370 walleyes and over 170 smallmouths. Fished six days but not very many hours each day it was to hot four days to sit all day in my boat
glad to hear you had a great trip...yeah, Cedar is known for its Muskys and Walleyes...it wont be long til smallies are included too..what camp did you stay at?
Is Cedar lake a good lake a good to go,for first timer?

RonCedar is pretty ideal (IMHO) for a newby. It is very easy to navigate and based on our groups first attempt 4 years ago, was fairly easy to find some fish. It is really a great fishery with both quantity and quality. For a drive in location it is east to get to and no need to go off roading down miles of logging roads.
Hey glenman we stayed at cedar point resort.
Ive always gone to Cedar Lake Lodge on the island but Cedar Point is probably in the best location on the lake..
